name: Crafted_Extreme_Measures_C
display_help: Enhances the accuracy of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Accuracy.Scale}%, the range of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Range.Scale}% and reduces interrupt time by {Boost.Attrib.InterruptTime.Scale}%.
power_short_helps: Enhances Accuracy, Range and Decreases Interrupt Time
